reviews.text: My husband and I landed into Terminal 2 today and walked to the station for our train.  I asked a Team Leader (I think his name  was Mike Falini, for some help).  He was absolutely brilliant with us, he took our large cases and stayed with us til the train arrived, then put the cases on the train for us.  Excellent service from this man, sorry if I have his name wrong.

Can anyone please tell me if there are luggage trollies at the station to transfer my bags to departures??? Thank you in anticipation.
Brenda x x
The staff are awesome can't beat northern hospitality

Flight was early so we had a train ticket which meant a wait of 2 hours. Due to unseasonal weather it was extremely cold and we were told a ticket for an earlier train would be an additional charge of £19 despite being an off-peak time. We will be driving next time as this is now a more financially viable option.
Good place but charges for trollies to go to the bus/train station using skyline. Completely dead place in midnight!
